basic_info.name: Anna University Admissions 2024
description: Anna University's admission process is completely online. The university conducts UG & PG admissions under Single Window Counselling every year covering about 1.50 lakh candidates. Admission to all courses (Except M.Sc) at Anna University courses is done based on scores obtained in the entrance examination followed by counseling. basic_info.name: Anna University Distance Education
description: Anna University distance education through its Centre for Distance Education. The courses offered are MBA, MCA, and M.Sc. Admission to the MBA and MCA courses is done through the Distance Education Entrance Test (DEET) while M.Sc admissions are based on merit in the qualifying examination. Candidates must hold a bachelor’s degree from a recognized university to be eligible for admission. The application process for distance learning courses at Anna University is completely online. Candidates who meet the eligibility can apply online on the official website. Check Anna University Distance Education

basic_info.name: Anna University Result
description: Anna University follows a dual semester system namely, Even Semester and Odd Semester. The university conducts examinations for even semesters in May–June and for odd semesters in November–December. Anna University results can be checked and downloaded by visiting the official website of the university. Students can access the results by entering their registration numbers and DoB. Results for affiliated colleges can also be checked concerning the Grade & Mark System for regular as well as revaluation exams.

basic_info.name: How to Check Anna University Result?
description: Given below are the steps to check and download the Anna University results online:
Step 1: Visit the official website @ www.annauniv.edu
Step 2: Select the result tab at the bottom of the homepage
Step 3: Once the list of results appears, click on the desired result
Step 4: Select the Exam and course, and enter the roll number and DOB in the portal
Step 5: Results will be displayed on the screen after entering the correct credentials
Note: It is advisable to download the document for further use.
Check More: Anna University Results

Section.name: About Anna University
Section.description:
Anna University is a government university located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is recognized by the UGC as a “University with Potential for Excellence” (UPE) and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. As per the NIRF 2023 rankings, Anna University is the 18th best university to study in India. Anna University offers 29 UG, 90 PG, and Doctorate level courses under 8 faculties and over 30 departments on its campus. Additionally, it offers more than 100 Degree and Diploma courses through its 593 affiliated colleges that have over 7.2 lakh students enrolled. Check Anna University Affiliated Colleges
Apart from full-time regular courses, Anna University offers distance learning courses through its Centre for Distance Education. Anna University is quite popular for its B.E/B. Tech, B.Arch, M.Tech, and MBA courses. However, the acceptance rate of Anna University is around 29% as only top-scoring candidates in entrance exams get admission here. Anna University accepts students based on entrance exams such as TANCET, CEETA PG, TNEA, NATA, UGC NET, and CSIR NET. Check Anna University Admission 2024
There is a significant rise in Anna University placement statistics during the 2022 placements drive. The university witnessed an increase of 53.15% in the number of job offers made during the 2022 placement drive as compared to 2021. The university also recorded a rise of 16.66% in the average package and 18.33% in the number of visiting companies. The highest salary package offered was INR 36 LPA and the average package stood at INR 7 LPA. Anna University has also collaborated with 35+ international universities for student exchange programs to provide better opportunities to its students.
Anna University campus is spread over 189 acres of land and is equipped with all the modern facilities. Additionally, it has 20 research centers and satellite campuses in Coimbatore, Tiruchirappalli, Madurai, and Tirunelveli. The university currently has 1400 PhD scholars and over 1600 students enrolled in the degree programs.

Ques. What are the eligibility criteria to apply for Anna University?
Ans. The eligibility criteria are to score qualifying marks in the entrance exam which are NATA, TANCET, and TNEA.
Ques. What is the placement record of Anna University?
Ans. Every year September to April the placement procedure goes on. Many reputed recruiters hire aspirant students and they offer CTC ranges up to 24 lacs per annum.
Ques. What are the facilities of Anna University?
Ans. Anna University offers various facilities for the students such as hostels, scholarship applications, a library, placement cells, etc. Men and women both accommodate hostels which consist of a common room, mess, TV, etc. Placement cell is very active in Anna University and the University's component colleges.
Ques. Does Anna University provide Distance Education?
Ans. Anna University provides a Distance Education program. The University offers distance education courses in MBA, MCA, and M.Sc in Computer Science program.
Ques. What are the eligibility criteria for the Distance education program at Anna University?
Ans. The eligibility criteria are mainly based on merit in the Anna University Distance Education program but for the MBA course, candidates need to have qualified marks in the CAT entrance exam.

faqs.question: Ques.What are the eligibility criteria to apply for Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The eligibility criteria are to score qualifying marks in the entrance exam which are NATA, TANCET, and TNEA.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the placement record of Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Every year September to April the placement procedure goes on. Many reputed recruiters hire aspirant students and they offer CTC ranges up to 24 lacs per annum.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the facilities of Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Anna University offers various facilities for the students such as hostels, scholarship applications, a library, placement cells, etc. Men and women both accommodate hostels which consist of a common room, mess, TV, etc. Placement cell is very active in Anna University and the University's component colleges.

faqs.question: Ques. Does Anna University provide Distance Education?
faqs.answer: Ans.Anna University provides a Distance Education program. The University offers distance education courses in MBA, MCA, and M.Sc in Computer Science program.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the eligibility criteria for the Distance education program at Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The eligibility criteria are mainly based on merit in the Anna University Distance Education program but for the MBA course, candidates need to have qualified marks in the CAT entrance exam.

faqs.question: What are the extracurricular activities organized at Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Anna University organizes a lot of extracurricular activities for the overall development of the students. Some of the activities are mentioned below:Literary Club: The club organizes various intra and inter-college events related to debates, writing, literature, poetry, and more.Youth Red Cross Club: this club organizes blood donation camps, a 7-day special camp for YRC volunteers in rural villages in and around Chennai during summer vacation.

faqs.question: Write the name of constituent colleges of Anna University.
faqs.answer: Ans.The constituent colleges of Anna University are mentioned below in a tabular form:University College of Engineering, RamanathapuramUniversity College of Engineering, AriyalurUniversity College of Engineering, AraniUniversity College of Engineering, VillupuramUniversity College of Engineering, NagercoilUniversity College of Engineering, TindivanamUniversity College of Engineering, PanrutiUniversity College of Engineering, Thirukkuvalai

faqs.question: Does Anna University provide facilities of a research center to the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, Anna University provides research facilities in different branches of Engineering, Technology, Architecture and Planning, Science and Humanities, and Management Studies. Besides this, the university provides a Ph.D. program twice a year.

faqs.question: Ques.  What is the fee structure for issuing different certificates at Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee structure for issuing different types of certificates from Anna University is mentioned below in a tabular form:CertificateFeesTransfer CertificateNo fees if applied within 5 working days of the beginning of the first term after leaving the college.Bonafide CertificateINR 20Attendance CertificateINR 20Implant Training CertificateINR 20Course Expenditure CertificateINR 20

faqs.question: What are the general rules for students at Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The general rules for students at Anna University are mentioned below:Cell phones are strictly prohibited inside the campus.Students should wear ID cards without fail and dress themselves nearly and decently.Only those students are eligible for scholarships who complete 75% of the total attendance.

faqs.question: What are the attendance criteria for students at Anna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The students of Anna University must have 75% of the total attendance in case they want to be eligible for the semester-end examination. However, the students who fail to do so are not even promoted to the next semester and have to repeat the incomplete semester in the next academic year.
